vap_water_column_mean_sea_water_speed.text: Mean Current Speed [m/s] is the annual average of depth-averaged current speed. For details, see the detailed Mean Current Speed documentation. Mean Current Speed is part of the High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, intended for reconnaissance-level tidal energy resource characterization. The dataset was funded by U.S. Department of Energy Water Power Technologies Office, designed and validated by Pacific Northwest National Laboratory  Ocean Dynamics and Modeling Group, and standardized, visualized, and released by National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team. Citation information and dataset documentation are available at Tidal Hindcast Dataset Documentation. Data are available through High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, which provides access to the full hindcast dataset. For questions, please contact National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team.
vap_water_column_mean_sea_water_speed.markdown: Mean Current Speed [m/s] is the annual average of depth-averaged current speed. For details, see the [detailed Mean Current Speed documentation](https://natlabrockies.github.io/Marine_Energy_Resource_Characterization/tidal-hindcast/#mean-current-speed). Mean Current Speed is part of the [High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI](https://mhkdr.openei.org/submissions/632), intended for reconnaissance-level tidal energy resource characterization. The dataset was funded by [U.S. Department of Energy](https://www.energy.gov/) [Water Power Technologies Office](https://www.energy.gov/eere/water/water-power-technologies-office), designed and validated by [Pacific Northwest National Laboratory  Ocean Dynamics and Modeling Group](https://www.pnnl.gov/projects/ocean-dynamics-modeling), and standardized, visualized, and released by [National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team](https://www.nlr.gov/water/resource-characterization). Citation information and dataset documentation are available at [Tidal Hindcast Dataset Documentation](https://natlabrockies.github.io/Marine_Energy_Resource_Characterization/tidal-hindcast/). Data are available through [High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI](https://data.openei.org/s3_viewer?bucket=marine-energy-data&prefix=us-tidal%2F), which provides access to the full hindcast dataset. For questions, please contact [National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team](https://www.nlr.gov/water/resource-characterization).

full_year_data_https_url.display_name: HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data
full_year_data_https_url.text: HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data [] is the hTTPS URL for downloading the complete one-year time series for this grid element. For details, see the detailed HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data documentation. HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data is part of the High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, intended for reconnaissance-level tidal energy resource characterization. The dataset was funded by U.S. Department of Energy Water Power Technologies Office, designed and validated by Pacific Northwest National Laboratory  Ocean Dynamics and Modeling Group, and standardized, visualized, and released by National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team. Citation information and dataset documentation are available at Tidal Hindcast Dataset Documentation. Data are available through High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, which provides access to the full hindcast dataset. For questions, please contact National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team.
full_year_data_https_url.markdown: HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data [] is the hTTPS URL for downloading the complete one-year time series for this grid element. For details, see the [detailed HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data documentation](https://natlabrockies.github.io/Marine_Energy_Resource_Characterization/tidal-hindcast/). HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data is part of the [High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI](https://mhkdr.openei.org/submissions/632), intended for reconnaissance-level tidal energy resource characterization. The dataset was funded by [U.S. Department of Energy](https://www.energy.gov/) [Water Power Technologies Office](https://www.energy.gov/eere/water/water-power-technologies-office), designed and validated by [Pacific Northwest National Laboratory  Ocean Dynamics and Modeling Group](https://www.pnnl.gov/projects/ocean-dynamics-modeling), and standardized, visualized, and released by [National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team](https://www.nlr.gov/water/resource-characterization). Citation information and dataset documentation are available at [Tidal Hindcast Dataset Documentation](https://natlabrockies.github.io/Marine_Energy_Resource_Characterization/tidal-hindcast/). Data are available through [High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI](https://data.openei.org/s3_viewer?bucket=marine-energy-data&prefix=us-tidal%2F), which provides access to the full hindcast dataset. For questions, please contact [National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team](https://www.nlr.gov/water/resource-characterization).

For details, see the detailed HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data documentation. HTTPS URL for Full Year Time Series Data is part of the High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, intended for reconnaissance-level tidal energy resource characterization. The dataset was funded by U.S. Department of Energy Water Power Technologies Office, designed and validated by Pacific Northwest National Laboratory Ocean Dynamics and Modeling Group, and standardized, visualized, and released by National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team. Citation information and dataset documentation are available at Tidal Hindcast Dataset Documentation. Data are available through High Resolution Tidal Hindcast Data Repository on OpenEI, which provides access to the full hindcast dataset. For questions, please contact National Laboratory of the Rockies Marine Energy Resource Characterization Team.
